title: 65B.136 MINORS.
text: A minor authorized under section 168.101, subdivision 1, to own a private passenger vehicle, as defined in section 65B.001, subdivision 3, may contract to buy a plan of reparation security, as defined in section 65B.43, subdivision 15, on that vehicle, as a contract that is fully binding on the minor on the same basis as if the minor were an adult. This section does not require an insurer to issue coverage to a minor or limit an insurer's underwriting discretion in regard to any aspect of the coverage.
